name: Million Faceman 3: Aloha Faceman!
description:
“Million Faceman 3: Aloha Faceman!” is the 3rd part to the FACEMAN story. Play parts 1 and 2 if you wanna see what happened.

In this episode, we find the superhero Million Faceman waking up on the last day the traveling circus he works for will be in the city. The next stop is Hawaii, and Faceman soon learns crime never takes a vacation!

This game is a FREE download for WINDOWS users 

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys run + jump
D key – shoot unlimited faces/direct faces/interact in face related actions
S key – hold to fly (while you have face points which refill when not used)
